title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-5.6 - Basic course of training
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-5.6 - Basic course of training

State Regulations

The basic course of training for real property appraisers
shall be the basic course of training specified in section
8188-2.6
of this Part except that attendance at the orientation seminar is not
required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8188-5.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
